title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: every time i try to start up league it just displays a message that says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" and when it starts loading it also says "Windows is checking for a solution to the problem" followed by "A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available." As you can probably tell, windows hasnt notified me of shit. So if you know how to fix this problem plz tell me, i just wanna play league and the ever broken tank {{champion:245}}

replies.body:
Really this just means that the patcher was prevented from starting, which we often see as a systems permissions thing (though it could also be the collective hate and frustration caused by tankko). 

I'd check out our [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434) article and go through the steps about problems with the patching process.  Lemme know if that works out for you!
